ovdesc.p: Allow to define the default size of a position. example Small -> 5%, Big -> 2%.
For further information please refer to the Wealth Portfolio Modelling User Guide

desc.p: Describes the sizing and is used for enrichment of the Code.
This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter the Description of the sizing code in various languages.
This is the code by which this sizing can be identified.
The code represents the ID of the table.
Specifies the default target percentage for a position.
Input cannot be less than zero
